originalText.text:
I have had a great, life-changing experience working with Irina for the last 16 months. Lost 63 pounds and truly enjoy the process, and the affirmations! This is now my lifestyle!
The full weight-loss program was easy to adapt to despite my very busy lifestyle.

The full weight-loss program was easy to adapt to despite my very busy lifestyle.

originalText.text: So glad I found NYC Health & Wellness. I had tried almost every diet out there and could not lose more then 20 pounds, I was so tired that I would fall asleep at work in the afternoons. Now I am at the lowest weight I have been in more then 4 years and I have so much energy that I get through my busy days without feeling tired at all. I was able to change my eating habits and now have a healthy active like restyle because I followed all of the recommendations from my wellness coach. All of the wellness coaches are great!  They are very friendly and knowledgeable. Thank you for giving me my life back!!!

originalText.text:
13 years—that's how long it's been since I decided to get into the best shape possible. I trained heavily—with a trainer—doing HIIT (high-intensity interval training) and a heavy weights program at least 4 times a week. I looked ok, felt ok, but was extremely frustrated that I wasn't getting the results I wanted given the amount of effort I was putting in. Different trainers over the years (I've had about 7 of them) gave me nutritional advice and none of it made much difference. I just resigned myself to it being genetics and, well, "that's life."

Now at 43 I decided one afternoon on a whim to search for a nutritionist in my area and stumbled on NYC Health and Nutrition. I read about the program, Irina's story, the work she does, and thought I'd give it a shot. The first meeting was right to the point. She listened to what my goals were and after a pause said, "let me guess, you want to look this..." and showed before and after pictures of some of her male clients. I said, "if you can get me to look like that I will have every person I know at your door."

She delivered. I started with NYC Health & Nutrition about 6 months ago, and here's what's happened:

• Total body fat has gone from 20% to 10%
• Belly fat, from 24% to 9.4%
• Visceral fat—the deep internal fat around organs—7.5 to 3
• Muscle mass, from 155.4 to 186.9
• Muscle quality, from 59 to 89.
• Weight, from 204 to 192

And at each of my weekly checkins the numbers just keep improving. I'm beyond thrilled with the results—looking and feeling better and better.

Make no mistake though—this DOES take dedication and commitment. Have those two solid, and you will get results. No magic pill here. It's a lifestyle change, and Irina has been with me the whole way. She's got a direct, no-nonsense approach, but still manages to keep everything light and fun. Her commitment to my successes is inspiring—checking everything I eat via photos over text, commenting and making adjustments, and answering any questions I have. I know so much more about what to do and what not to do, and seeing the hard work in the gym finally bear fruit has been nothing short of amazing.

So I've kept up my end of the bargain—telling everyone who will listen about this fantastic person and program.

originalText.text: Very supportive and knowledgeable about their service made me feel confident and where always available to answer any of my questions. Im blessed to have met them and to become business partners with. I am learning so much from them. Thank you
